files.help:
Supported by default.

Newer versions of neovim automatically create files at correct locations. You can move your configuration to _$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/nvim/_ and delete this directory.

Supported by default.

Newer versions of neovim automatically create files at correct locations, so this can safely be deleted.
